mapper.insert:
insert into travelplan (user_id,location,start_date, end_date,register_time) values (#{userId},#{location},#{startDate}, #{endDate}, now())
select last_insert_id()
INSERT INTO travelplaninfo (articleNo,title, content, addr1, localimageurl) VALUES (#{articleNo},#{title} ,#{content}, #{addr1}, #{firstimage})
mapper.select: select a.articleNo, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.subject,a.user_id,a.register_time,a.star_count,b.travelplan_id,b.articleNo,b.content_id,b.title,b.addr1,b.first_image from travelplan a , travelplaninfo b where a.articleNo = b.articleNo order by a.articleNo desc
select articleNo from travelplan order by articleNo desc limit 1;
